company_info.Company Description: About Us- Unique Travelite Services Pvt. Ltd.UTS Is An ISO Certified Entity Listed On Ministry Of Corporate Affairs. Our Company Provides Best-In-Class Service In The Travel & Tourism Sector Across World

api_data.job_title: Immediate Requirement For Online Promotion Work earn 8k to 10k on Weekly Basis

jd_information.description: Jobs Available For Part Timers and Full Timers AlsoWe Need Passionate People For Customer Service To Contribute In The Promotion & Growth Of Our Business In Travel & Tourism Earn Huge Benefits In Form Of Income (Weekly/Monthly), Freebies & An Excellent Opportunity To Build Your Own Network & Visibility Countrywide. No Targets, No Product Selling, No Boss, No Work Pressure. All Committed & Interested People Can Call Us. Looking Forward To Transforming Your Dreams to Reality.HR ManagerMiss SALMA MIRZA9210245755
